SRP.Q: On the Capacity Utilization Rate, is the point for Brown-Scott inside or outside the point for Lee, Johnson and Fernandez?
SRP.A: On the Capacity Utilization Rate, the point for Brown-Scott is inside the point for Lee, Johnson and Fernandez.
